name: Savage Offroad
description:
SAVAGE OFFROAD is a retro-inspired truck racing game set in a post apocalyptic future. It's part racing, part gladiatorial combat and ALL ACTION! Join a tribe of irradiated savages that FIGHT and RACE for the future!

Features:
Support for local multiplayer up to 4 players
Single player mode VS savage AI
Race four trucks or up to 16 for complete brutality
Split screen or classic top-down view
Eliminations - race to win or die trying
Upgrade your truck
Collect turbos and cash on 15 awesome tracks
Original Soundtrack

Planned Updates:
Online multiplayer
More tracks
More trucks
And more based on player feedback
